mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.EMPL_ID, B.BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_WRITE_TYPE, NVL(CNT,0) AS BOARD_FILE_COUNT FROM BOARD_TBL B JOIN BOARD_TYPE_TBL D ON(B.BOARD_TYPE = D.BOARD_TYPE) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT F.BOARD_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS CNT FROM BOARD_FILE_TBL F GROUP BY F.BOARD_NO) C ON(B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO) ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_TBL WHERE
BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
EMPL_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
